# Helicopter Tail Rotor
---

## XML ID
`HeliTailRotor-1`

## Part Variables
* **RPM**: The current rotational speed of the tail rotor. (Revolutions per minute)
* **Thrust**: The lateral force generated by the tail rotor. (Newtons)
